principles: All complaints are handled promptly and transparently.
Customers have the right to escalate unresolved issues to management or legal authorities.
steps: Contact our support via email or phone (see site-config.json).
If unresolved after 3 working days, escalate by marking your email as 'Escalation'.
If still unresolved after 5 working days, request referral to the owner or admin.
Final arbitration is with Bangladesh Consumer Protection Authority.
